# 第四周作业

## 6.2 某地区土壤所含可给态磷分析

#### 输入数据：
```{r}
df <- data.frame(
  x1=c(0.4, 0.4, 3.1, 0.6, 4.7, 1.7, 9.4, 10.1, 11.6, 12.6, 10.9, 23.1, 23.1, 21.6, 23.1, 1.9, 26.8, 29.9),
  x2=c(52, 23, 19, 34, 24, 65, 44, 31, 29, 58, 37, 46, 50, 44, 56, 36, 58, 51),
  x3=c(158, 163, 37, 157, 59, 123, 46, 117, 173, 112, 111, 114, 134, 73, 168, 143, 202, 124),
  y =c(64, 60, 71, 61, 54, 77, 81, 93, 93, 51, 76, 96, 77, 93, 95, 54, 168, 99)
);
```

#### 显示数据：
```{r results='asis'}
library(xtable)
xdf <- xtable(df)
digits(xdf) <- c(0,1,0,0,0)
print(xdf, type='html', html.table.attributes='border="1"; style="border-style: solid;border-width: 1px;"')
rm(xdf)
detach("package:xtable", unload=TRUE)
```

#### 求Y关于X的多元线性回归方程
```{r}
lm.sol <- lm(y ~ x1 + x2 + x3, data = df)
summary(lm.sol)
```
